content: edie beanie is a hat knitted from a charted pattern first you work the corrugated ribbing with size 2 needles then switch to size 3 needles for the rest of the color work the botanical flower design travels up the hat and ends with the flowers coming together to make a star shape at the crown yarn needed knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn coriander heather mc 51 yds merlot heather 30 yds autumn heather 25 yds oyster heather 51 yds verdant heather 25 yds forest heather 30 yds camel heather 25 yds
